lead_paragraph: Pegasus, the winged white stallion of Ancient Greek mythology, may have been the equine world's first frequent flyer but today's Olympic horses are the real globetrotters racking up the air miles.

headline.print_headline: Globetrotting Horses Take Flight for Rio
headline.main: Globetrotting Horses Take Flight for Rio

snippet: Pegasus, the winged white stallion of Ancient Greek mythology, may have been the equine world's first frequent flyer but today's Olympic horses are the real globetrotters racking up the air miles....
